cc.layouttools

Class ZoomAsmmod

  • java.lang.Object
    • cc.layouttools.BisearchPasteAsmMod
      • cc.layouttools.ZoomAsmmod
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FullSurInsideAssembler, FullSurOutsideAssembler, LeftBottomAsmmod, LeftTopAsmmod, LRBInsideAsmmod, LRBOutsideAsmmod, LRTDoorAsmmod, PasteFlatpushSticking, RightTopAsmmod, RightTopHookAsmmod, TBLSurroundAsmmod, TBLSurroundAssembler

    public abstract class ZoomAsmmod
extends BisearchPasteAsmMod
    適用於靠縮放合併的模組，若是兩活字是靠縮放比例來當參數調整，就可適用此型態。
